title: Paris-Roubaix: Van der Poel Scores Historic Triple after Poga훾ar Crashes out of Cobblestone Slugfest
content:
Poga훾ar overshoots corner and crashes deep into the final of wild ride through 'Hell of the North,' holds off chase group for second place on debut.

Read the full article at Paris-Roubaix: Van der Poel Scores Historic Triple after Poga훾ar Crashes out of Cobblestone Slugfest on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
